alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; Pierce; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued October 30 at 2:58PM CDT until October 30 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Southeastern Bottineau County in north central North Dakota... Northern Pierce County in north central North Dakota... Southwestern Rolette County in north central North Dakota... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 257 PM CDT, a dangerous snow squall was located 5 miles southeast of Rolette, or 18 miles northeast of Rugby, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions with near zero visibility associated with intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous and life-threatening travel conditions are expected to develop rapidly in the warning area. Travelers along Highway 3 will be impacted. Be ready for a rapid change in visibility. Locations impacted include... Rugby, Rolette, Wolford, Barton, Barton City, Overly, Nanson, and Thorne. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...RADAR INDICATED SNOW SQUALL IMPACT...SIGNIFICANT
